articles.title: Participants in 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Tour Pyongyang
articles.content:
Participants in 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of WPK Tour Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea continue touring Pyongyang.
					 They visited the Revolutionary Martyrs' Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They went round several places of the Phyongchon Revolutionary Site.
					
					 Visiting the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, they went round several halls including the Guards Units Hall conveying the fighting exploits of officers and men of the Guards Units.

articles.title: Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket and Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un received a basket of flowers and a congratulatory letter from the Military Attaches Corps here on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of his assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to Army General Pak Yong Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Russian Military Attache Alexei Bartusov, doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Socialist Constitution Day Marked
articles.content:
Socialist Constitution Day Marked
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The leading newspapers of the DPRK on Wednesday dedicate editorials to the Socialist Constitution Day.
					 President Kim Il Sung framed and promulgated the "Socialist Constitution of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" 45 years ago, which was a historic event of weighty significance in the political life of the Korean people and the socialist cause.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says:
					
					 The Socialist Constitution of the DPRK is the most revolutionary political charter in history. It affirms legislatively the great victories and successes achieved by the Korean people in socialist construction under the banner of the immortal Juche idea, and lays down the principles governing the state and social life and the important tasks for defending and accomplishing the socialist cause.
					
					 The enactment of the Constitution provided a legal guarantee for reliably defending the state and social system centered on the popular masses, and thus the Korean people could have a powerful legal weapon to fully display the advantage of Juche socialism.
					
					 The Korean people are very proud of having the Socialist Constitution as they value socialism, their life and soul, and love it very much.
					
					 The state laws such as the Socialist Constitution have creditably played their role as a weapon of defending the Korean-style socialism. This is inseparable from the wise leadership of the Party and the leader.
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all the people to strive for thoroughly applying the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Constitution in all fabrics of social life and thus further promote the building of a powerful socialist country and firmly defend and glorify the world's best Korean socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: DPRK's Socialist Law Is Most Popular: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Socialist Law Is Most Popular: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun on Wednesday in an article says that the socialist law of the DPRK which comprehensively embodies the great Juche idea is the most popular and revolutionary in its structure and contents.
					 It goes on:
					
					 People's will, demand, aspiration and desire are placed in the first place in establishing laws in the DPRK.
					
					 Not only the Socialist Constitution but also the laws in all areas are enacted in the principle of giving priority to the people and respecting them and the socialist state of DPRK revises and supplements an existing law and enacts a new law in the interests of the people as required by the times and developing reality.
					
					 The state sovereignty and the means of production rest with the people and they are fully enjoying the democratic freedom and rights in the DPRK.
					
					 The socialist law of the DPRK allows all the citizens the right to vote for and to be elected irrespective of sex, occupation, property status, education, political view and religious belief and the right to free speech, publication, assembly, association, demonstration, complaint and petition and other political rights and freedom are guaranteed in the DPRK.
					
					 The state also gives the working people a wide scope of rights and freedom including the right to job, the right to receive their shares according to the quality and amount of labor, the right to free education and free medical treatment and the freedom of activities in science, literature and arts and the state firmly guarantees by law the responsibility for material and cultural life of the people.
					
					 Today, the people in DPRK realize that their interests and happiness are secured and the socialist system centered on masses are defended only when the socialist laws are observed and they are taking an active part in creating an atmosphere of law observance.

articles.title: No Force Can Stop Korean People from Victorious Advance
articles.content:
No Force Can Stop Korean People from Victorious Advance
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The recent "sanctions resolution" of the UN Security Council, manipulated by the U.S., is an illegal document of no legitimacy, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary.
					 It is quite just that the DPRK branded and flatly rejected the "sanctions resolution" as a wanton violation of its sovereignty and a war act of harassing peace and stability in the Korean peninsula and the region, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The reason that we opted for the simultaneous development of the two fronts was to defend the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country form the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail policy and nuclear threat and ensure the peaceful life of the people and reliably guarantee the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and, furthermore, the world.
					
					 The U.S. would be gravely mistaken if it thinks it can check the victorious advance of the Korean people with such "sanctions resolution".
					
					 Its pursuance of the policy for stifling the DPRK will only plunge the U.S. into the pitfall dug by itself.
					
					 It is clear that the U.S. recourse to force would plunge its mainland in the nuclear holocaust and accelerate its ruin in the planet.
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces and the Japanese reactionaries have to bear in mind that their active moves to stifle the DPRK by taking the advantage of the U.S. would prompt the merciless retaliatory blow from the DPRK.
					
					 The blame for all the consequences to be entailed by the "sanctions resolution" will be put on those countries which raised their hands for its adoption.
					
					 No force can stop the army and people of the DPRK from making dynamic advance toward bolstering the state nuclear force under the great banner of simultaneous development of the two fronts despite whatever sanctions and pressure moves.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Policy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korean Regime's Confrontational Policy
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Even after the collapse of the conservative regime in south Korea, the inter-Korean ties have still remained confrontational and gone through twists and turns. That is entirely attributable to the puppet authorities' anti-reunification "policy toward the north," says Rodong Sinmun in an article on Wednesday.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The "policy toward the north" of the present south Korean ruling forces is little different from the confrontational policy pursued by the preceding conservative regimes.
					
					 Crying out for "fundamental solution of the nuclear issue", and claiming that "the general goal of dialogue is to resolve the nuclear issue", they invented the "policy towards the north" the keynote of which "is to resolve the nuclear issue". This well shows their criminal scheme to link the inter-Korean relations to the nuclear issue deliberately in an attempt to stifle the fellow countrymen in the north through cooperation with the foreign force in the anti-DPRK nuclear campaign.
					
					 The north-south relations have nothing to do with the nuclear issue.
					
					 The nuclear issue was spawned by the U.S. nuclear blackmail and aggression moves against the DPRK. The U.S. turned south Korea into an advanced base for aggression on the DPRK and, on this basis, had resorted to ceaseless reckless nuclear war moves in the Korean peninsula. After all, the DPRK could not but have access to nuclear deterrent for self-defense.
					
					 The nuclear issue is a matter that should be settled between the DPRK and the U.S., and the south Korean puppet regime has no justification to poke its nose into the issue.
					
					 History clearly showed that if the south Korean puppet forces refuse to settle the fundamental issue of the nation and go frantic in the nuclear campaign against the DPRK in league with foreign forces, deliberately linking the nuclear issue to the inter-Korean ties, the north-south relations are doomed to be at a low ebb.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Arrest and Punishment Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Arrest and Punishment Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Simultaneous actions were reportedly taken by organizations and citizens in different parts of Seoul on Dec. 23 calling for traitor Lee Myung Bak's arrest.
					 Outside the Sejong Cultural Center, a meeting of workers, peasants, students and other people from all walks of life was held under the sponsorship of the "Citizens Alliance for MB Arrest."
					
					 Speakers demanded that the deep-seated evils should be eradicated as soon as possible through Lee's arrest.
					
					 There took place a candlelight demo near Lee's home.

articles.title: S. Korea: Victims of Fire and Bereaved Families Protest Puppet Authorities
articles.content:
S. Korea: Victims of Fire and Bereaved Families Protest Puppet Authorities
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Victims of huge fire disaster in Jechon City, North Chungchong Province of south Korea, and their bereaved families reportedly lodged protest with the chief executive on Dec. 22.
					 They protested the chief executive who visited hospital that had the window been broken earlier in the building enveloped in fire, lots more people would have been survived.
					
					 They broke into anger, saying it is not the first time that the "government" tackled accident this way.
					
					 They said they felt frustration at measures taken by the authorities for preventing accidents, although they claimed people's lives are above all.

articles.title: Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
articles.content:
Bird Flu Spreads in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Bird flu reportedly spreads in south Korea.
					 The results of a test of the bird flu virus found in a duck farm in North Jolla Province on Dec. 22 confirmed that it is H5N6 type.
					
					 Earlier on Dec. 19 highly pathogenic bird flu virus was found positive in wild bird dung in Chonan City of South Chungchong Province.
					
					 There reportedly occurred nine such cases so far this winter.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced in Brazil
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Brief Biography Introduced in Brazil
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Center for the Study of Songun Politics posted the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il and his photos on its website on Dec. 17, the 6th anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Demise Anniversary Observed
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to observe the 6th demise anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Memorial meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Norway, the Czech Republic, Switzerland, Sweden, Iceland, Denmark and Finland from Dec. 12 to 17.
					
					 On display at their venues were photos showing the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also there were works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing the achievements made by the army and people of the DPRK in the building of a socialist power.
					
					 "Kimjongilia", "Flag of the Workers' Party of Korea" and other Korean films were shown.
					
					 Dag Norum, chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway praised Kim Jong Il as the master thinker-theoretician who formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung into Kimilsungism.
					
					 Iri Vabr, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, said that Kim Jong Il was an distinguished leader who defended and victoriously led socialism of Korea with rare leadership ability and a peerless patriot and tender-hearted father who devoted his whole life to prosperity of the country and happiness of the people.
					
					 Jon Arni Halldorsson, secretary general of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society, said Kim Jong Il led the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people to a victory, smashing the imperialists' escalating anti-DPRK moves by dint of Songun.
					
					 Anders Kristensen, chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association, praised the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events in the Czech Republic and Denmark.

articles.title: Kim Jong Suk Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Jong Suk Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, December 27 (KCNA) -- Foreign media featured articles from December 14 to 20 to observe the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Zebri Deve, an online newspaper of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia, and its internet homepage DPRK Today featured articles under such titles as "The DPRK will mark the 100th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk, the anti-Japanese war heroine and the mother of the revolution" and "Anti-Japanese War Heroine Kim Jong Suk", illustrated with her photo and an art work depicting her.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "100th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Suk", which said:
					
					 History recorded many famous women who contributed to progress and prosperity of their nations and countries but there was no such woman political activist as Kim Jong Suk who dedicated her all to the freedom and happiness of the people.
					
					 The Kim Jong Il Library of Ecuador and the Juche Youth Group in Ecuador posted an article titled "Patriotic Life, on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk", illustrated with an art work depicting her.
					
					 The African Regional Committee for Friendship and Solidarity with the Korean People headquartered in Nigeria, in an article titled "Legendary woman commander of guerillas" posted on its website, praised her as prominent woman revolutionary of the Korean nation and the woman commander who staged an anti-Japanese guerilla struggle for many years.
					
					 The noble life of the anti-Japanese war heroine and legendary woman guerilla commander will always be remembered by not only the Korean people but also other progressive peoples in the world, the article stressed.

articles.title: Participantes en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas visitan varios lugares
articles.content:
Participantes en V Conferencia de Presidentes de Celulas visitan varios lugares
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los participantes en la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea visitaron varios lugares de la capital.
					En el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el monte Taesong ellos rindieron homenaje a la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk tras colocar cestos de flores ante su busto.
					
					Recorrieron varios puntos del Lugar de Interes Historico-Revolucionario de Phyongchon.
					
					Luego, visitaron el Museo Conmemorativo de la Victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria donde pasaron revista a varias salas incluso la de Unidades Guardias.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia la Constitucion Socialista de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Constitucion Socialista de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que encarna totalmente la gran idea Juche, es la ley mas popular y revolucionaria tanto en su sistema de composicion como en su contenido.
					Adelanta el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este miercoles y continua:
					
					La Republica Popular Democratica de Corea pone estrictamente la voluntad, la demanda, la aspiracion y deseo del pueblo en el primer lugar de la elaboracion de leyes.
					
					La Constitucion socialista y otras leyes de ramas tambien fueron establecidas ateniendose al principio de dar importancia y respeto al pueblo. 
					
					Tambien, nuestro Estado socialista enmienda la ley o establece nuevos reglamentos conforme a los intereses de la poblacion. 
					
					En esta sociedad socialista todo el pueblo disfruta suficientemente de la libertad y derechos democraticos como dueno del Poder estatal y de los medios de produccion. 
					
					La ley socialista de Corea asegura a todos los ciudadanos los derechos y libertad politicos, entre otros, los derechos a elegir y ser elegido, las libertades de palabra, de prensa, de mitin, de asociacion y de manifestacion, y los derechos a la reclamacion y peticion, por encima de distincion del sexo y ocupaciones, bienes y conocimientos, criterios politicos y creencias religiosas. 
					
					Ademas, facilita el derecho al trabajo, el de distribucion segun la calidad y cantidad del trabajo, el de educacion y asistencia medica gratuitas, la libertad de las actividades cientificas, literarias y artisticas, etc. 
					
					Segun la ley, el Estado atiende con responsabilidad la vida material y cultural de la poblacion. 
					
					Hoy dia, los coreanos, conscientes de que la ejecucion de la ley socialista constituye la via para defender sus propios intereses y felicidad y el regimen socialista coreano centrado en las masas populares, observan estrictamente la ley socialista.

articles.title: Nadie puede detener el avance victorioso de pueblo coreano, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Nadie puede detener el avance victorioso de pueblo coreano, enfatiza Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual publicado este miercoles el diario Rodong Sinmun califico de documento ilegal la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, recien fabricada bajo el mando de Estados Unidos contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Es muy justa la RPDC que rechazo totalmente esa "resolucion de sancion" definiendola como flagrante violacion de la soberania nacional y accion de guerra que destruye la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto de la region.
					
					Hemos optado por el camino del desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares con el objeto de defender la soberania y la integridad territorial del pais desde la politica de chantaje y amenaza nucleares de EE.UU., asegurar la vida pacifica de la poblacion y garantizar fidedignamente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion, si el imperio americano piensa que la "resolucion de sancion" podria detener el avance victorioso del pueblo coreano. 
					
					Por mas que recurra a la politica de aplastamiento a la RPDC con la confianza excesiva en su fuerza, EE.UU. se caera mas en la trampa preparada por si mismo y su territorio principal sufrira los desastres nucleares y desaparecera de este planeta. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos y los reaccionarios japoneses no deben olvidar ni un momento que sus maniobras de aplastamiento a la RPDC, que se perpetran en contubernio con EE.UU., traeran el implacable golpe de venganza de la potencia socialista. 
					
					La responsabilidad de las consecuencias de la aprobacion de la "resolucion de sancion" recaera enteramente sobre los paises que lo apoyaron. 
					
					Nadie puede detener el avance del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que fortalecen mas las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado frustrando despiadadamente los alborotos de sancion y presion de toda indole bajo la bandera de la linea de desarrollo paralelo.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la politica de confrontacion de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la politica de confrontacion de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 27 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Este ano, en el Sur de Corea fue derrumbado el "poder" conservador. Pero, las relaciones entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea no se liberaron del estado de confrontacion, sino sufre las severas vicisitudes, lo cual se debe enteramente a la "politica hacia el Norte" de caracter anti-reunificacion practicada por las actuales autoridades surcoreanas.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual publicado este miercoles y continua:
					
					La "politica" de las actuales autoridades surcoreanas no tiene, en su esencia, diferencia con la politica conflictiva de los antecesores "poderes" conservadores. Los titeres surcoreanos inventaron esa "politica hacia el Norte" que persigue principalmente la "solucion del problema nuclear del Norte" mientras que hablaron de la "solucion radical del problema nuclear" e insistieron en que "la meta general del dialogo es la solucion del problema nuclear". Estos actos estan demostrando la intriga criminal de los titeres surcoreanos para vincular intencionalmente el asunto de relaciones intercoreanas con el problema nuclear y aplastar a los miembros de la misma nacion mediante la cooperacion con las fuerzas foraneas en la campana nuclear anti-RPDC.
					
					Las relaciones intercoreanas no tienen nada que ver con el problema nuclear.
					
					El problema nuclear fue emergido por la amenaza y chantaje nuclear de EE.UU. y sus maniobras de guerra de agresion contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. EE.UU. convirtio el Sur de Corea en la base avanzada para agredir la RPDC y ha venido desarrollando sin cesar las maniobras imprudentes para provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana. A fin de hacer frente a esto la RPDC se vio obligada a poseer el disuasivo nuclear para la autodefensa.
					
					El problema nuclear es el problema que debe ser solucionado entre la RPDC y EE.UU. Los titeres surcoreanos no tienen ninguna razon de meterse en este asunto.
					
					Si los titeres surcoreanos intentan vincular intencionalmente el problema nuclear con las relaciones intercoreanas y se enfrascan en los alborotos nucleares contra la RPDC dando vista gorda al problema fundamental de la nacion, las relaciones entre ambas partes de Corea no podran evitar la destruccion, lo cual fue comprobado claramente por la historia.
